author: Iyola Oyabiyi
quote: Every adult is responsible for themselves, regardless of the situation, who is at fault, or whether it’s fair.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: John Wooden
quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

author: Buddha
quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

author: Anne Frank
quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

author: Socrates
quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.

author: Rumi
quote: Do not be satisfied with the stories that come before you. Unfold your own myth.

author: Plato
quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
